# accessibilityFocusedUIElement

**Instance Property**

The child accessibility element with the current focus.

## Declaration

```swift
var accessibilityFocusedUIElement: Any { get }
```

## Supporting Accessibility

- **accessibilityChildren()**: Returns the accessibility element’s children in the accessibility hierarchy.
- **accessibilityLabel()**: Returns a short description of the layout area.
- **accessibilitySelectedChildren()**: Returns the layout area’s currently selected children.
